actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 111(a) of title 38, United States Code, relating to the payment of travel expenses for persons traveling to and from Veterans Administration facilities.

summary.text: Sets minimum levels for the payment of travel expenses for persons traveling to and from Veterans' Administration facilities at $20 for meals and lodging. Stipulates that the mileage rate shall not be less than the current Department of Transportation estimate of the average variable costs per mile of operating an automobile.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 111(a) of title 38, United States Code, relating to the payment of travel expenses for persons traveling to and from Veterans Administration facilities.
